from.S: base.games g inner join base.locations l on g.location_id = l.location_id left join rundown.location_history h on g.location_id = h.location_id AND g.date_created BETWEEN h.start_date AND h.end_date and g.application_type <> 3 AND g.game_reference NOT LIKE '%-BP-%' left join crosscheck.tags t on t.game_id = g.game_id

group_by.S: g.game_id, g.game_reference,g.game_type, g.is_data_verified, g.date_created, l.location_id, l.name, h.software_version, h.oem_version, h.radar_model, h.radar_serial

select.S: g.game_id,g.game_reference,g.game_type,extract(year from g.date_created),g.is_data_verified,CASE WHEN g.game_type IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 14, 19, 26, 30, 61) AND g.is_data_verified = TRUE THEN true ELSE false END AS metadata_reliability,l.location_id,l.name,h.software_version, h.oem_version, h.radar_model, h.radar_serial, min(t.measurement_time) as first_pitch, max(t.measurement_time) as last_pitch, getdate() as date_processed
